alert.note: Alert for Muskogee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 8:28AM CDT until May 06 at 8:28AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Arkansas River near Muskogee affecting Muskogee County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River near Muskogee. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, areas on the grounds of the OG&E power plant are flooded. Moderate agricultural flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 27.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 31.6 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
